Join Us!

Become a member of one of the fastest growing communities in the security industry!


* Under no circumstance will your organization's logo be placed on this page unless they wish to express their involvement with the project and provide written consent for their logo to be included.



Join The Community!

Sign up for the CRITs mailing lists and stay up-to-date on the project and everyone in the community, or join us on IRC and chat in real-time!

Get The Code

Join the community on Github. Whether you want the code, need to report an issue, or want to contribute back, we'd love to hear from you!
